title: Pornhub Sees Spike In Search For ‘Joker’, SRK's Witty Reply And More From Ent World
text:
After being absent from the limelight for a long time, Bollywood's 'Badshah' Shah Rukh Khan finally made his presence felt on Twitter by striking a conversation with his fans, making #AskSRK to the top-trending hashtag.

What happens when the much-awaited movie hits the screen? People are in awe, social media to dining table discussions – all revolve around it, people search for more information about the movie on the internet etc, right? But when Joaquin Phoenix’s masterpiece ‘Joker’ had hit the screens, some horny people, actually a lot of them, were searching for the porn version of it.

In a statement they said, “more of us will speak every day”. They also asked whether such harassment by misusing courts was a ploy to slice the voices of citizens.

Don't Miss 252 SHARES

It's tough time for Marvel Fans and they are totally heartbroken to know that their favourite star Tom Holland has shaved off his beautiful hair. A new video that in no time went viral shows him in a bald look as he shove his head.

This evoked reactions of many celebrities who raised their voice through various ways. Amidst the ongoing protests against cutting trees in Mumbai's Aarey Colony to build a Metro rail yard, actor Riteish Deshmukh shared his views on the situation, saying "we all need sustainable urbanization and cutting off old trees is certainly not the solution to handle the situation".
description: After being absent from the limelight for a long time, Bollywood's 'Badshah' Shah Rukh Khan finally made his presence felt on Twitter by striking a conversation with his fans, making #AskSRK to the top-trending hashtag. What happens when the much-awaited movie hits the screen?
